name: Amboseli National Park
description: Famous for its large elephant herds and views of Mount Kilimanjaro.

name: Maasai Mara National Reserve
description: Renowned for the Great Migration and abundant wildlife including lions, cheetahs, and zebras.

name: Tsavo East National Park
description: One of the largest parks in Kenya, known for its red elephants and arid landscapes.

name: Tsavo West National Park
description: Features the Mzima Springs, volcanic hills, and diverse wildlife.
